item.description:
Let's do it again....We had a blast listening or dancing to LaTanya Farrell and her band last month.  If you missed it come on and join us.   Everything on the menu and drinks are reasonable.  Whether you just like to sit back and listen to a great band and vocalist, or if you wanna dance, come on over to the Red Rock Tavern on Capital Ave for some fun.  Depending on the group we could combine Red Rock with an earlier venue at the Wadsworth Atheneum, just down the road.  I will post the details if you are interested.

Normally $5 cover at the door.
item.how_to_find_us: Will have a reservation for Stuart

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: First Thursday - Pop, R&B, Soul artist LaTanya Farrell and Bookman Style Band
